title: FITE's Weber is Showing Fights and Helping Cut Cords
itunes:title: FITE's Weber is Showing Fights and Helping Cut Cords
description:
In a world awash with content but missing in-person sports, FITE has expanded beyond its combat sports roots into a broad array of pay-per-view content. Mike Weber, FITE's chief operating officer, joins the show to talk about leveraging his experience in pro wrestling and other sports. Streaming services have reintroduced the debate around who will pay how much, for what, and when, and the pandemic has accelerated some of the most disruptive elements of how we distribute and watch sports.
